backend/main.mo: Motoko backend canister defining admin auth tokens, user profiles, CMS entities, and authorization checks with state stored in Maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs for admin error handling and replica rejection logic.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing functionality of various frontend admin and public components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styling utilities.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file that loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Admin panel layout with a sidebar, navigation links, logout handling, and an Outlet for nested admin pages.
frontend/src/admin/AdminLogin.tsx: Admin login form that submits credentials, displays standardized English error messages, and handles loading and session errors.
frontend/src/admin/AdminRoutes.tsx: Handles admin session token validation and conditionally renders login, loading, or admin layout.
frontend/src/admin/components/Initialize: Provides a card with a confirmation dialog to initialize sample site content.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminAuth.ts: Defines login and logout mutations for admin authentication and token management.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminSession: Manages admin token and session error state using sessionStorage.
Loads site stats, shows optional content initializer, and displays admin dashboard cards.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminNotFound.t: Shows a styled 404 page for missing admin routes with a link back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/admin/pages/ContactInfoEdit: Loads and edits contact information using a form with validation and update mutation.
frontend/src/admin/pages/GalleryEditor.t: Manages gallery items with add, edit, and delete dialogs backed by react-query mutations.
frontend/src/admin/pages/MessagesInbox.t: Displays and manages contact messages with delete confirmation and loading/error states.
Provides CRUD UI for products using dialogs for editing and deletion with form handling.
Allows creating, editing, and deleting site content sections with a dialog-based form.
frontend/src/admin/pages/SiteSettingsEdi: Lets admins view and update global site settings such as name and logo URL.
frontend/src/admin/ProfileSetupModal.tsx: Displays a modal for entering a user name and saves the profile via a mutation.
frontend/src/admin/utils/adminAuthErrorM: Defines admin auth error messages and helpers to map rejection details to user-friendly text.
frontend/src/admin/utils/option.ts: Extracts string values from Motoko-style optional results, handling various shapes.
frontend/src/admin/utils/replicaRejectio: Parses errors to extract replica rejection details and detect canister-stopped cases.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes for public pages and admin pages with an auth gate and renders the app with theming and toast support.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Renders the site logo using settings with a fallback image on load failure.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: React form using react-hook-form to submit contact messages via mutation with validation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/HeaderNav.tsx: Responsive navigation header with links, mobile drawer, and login/logout controls using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/QueryState.tsx: Reusable UI components for loading, error, empty states, and skeleton placeholders.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer displaying site settings, quick links, and contact info loaded from queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches backend actor instances based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and session state.
frontend/src/hooks/useLogout.ts: Clears Internet Identity session and resets all React Query caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating site settings, sections, and other backend data using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes and applies base styling.
frontend/src/layout/PublicLayout.tsx: Provides a public-facing page layout with header, footer, and routed content.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Fetches and displays about‑related content sections with loading, error, and fallback states.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders contact information and a contact form with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays a gallery grid with modal view support and handles loading, errors, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the main homepage with hero content, site settings, and featured sections.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Loads and displays product cards with skeletons, error handling, and empty state support.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL and hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, shadows, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, goals, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature records.
